### Hi! I am Fernanda

I am a data analyst with a background in biomedical sciences. I am from Brazil and I am also an [R-Lady](https://rladies-sp.org/).  
  
Since 2017, I create content about statistics and data analysis for research workers on [my YouTube channel](https://youtube.com/c/FernandaPeres). My main interests are hypothesis testing, data visualization and R Programming.
